message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a price of $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for this product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
